description.paragraph: Inspired fencing is a local family business based in Somerville on the beautiful Mornington Peninsula. At Inspired fencing, we endeavor to go that extra mile for our clients in making sure your fence is built how you want from first inspection and quoting to starting and finishing construction. If you require any further information, have any questions, or would like to arrange a time to book your free measure & quote, please feel free to contact us today

quote.text: We take pride in our commitment to excellence, backing our work with a 100% workmanship guarantee. If you encounter any concerns or issues with any aspect of our fencing or gate installations, we are dedicated to addressing and resolving them promptly. At Inspired Fencing, our primary objective is to ensure every client is not just satisfied but 100% delighted with the outcome of our work.
quote.name: Rowan Higgs

fields.subtitle: Fencing Services
fields.title: Trusted Fencing Contractor in Flinders
fields.description: Our unwavering dedication to customer satisfaction sets us apart. If you're in search of a fencing and gate contractor that gets the job done right from the start, your search ends here. Choose Inspired Fencing for a seamless blend of quality, reliability, and customer-centric service that leaves you with security and style that exceeds your expectations.

card1.title: Fences
card1.description: We offer a wide range of elegent but affordable fence solutions.

card2.title: Gates
card2.description: Our gates are build to last & we will build your fence to stand out in the crowd!

fields.subtitle: Testimonials
fields.title: WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS HAVE TO SAY ABOUT OUR WORK
fields.description: We don't just boast about our work; our clients place their trust in us. See for yourself what a few of our customers have shared about their interactions with Inspired Fencing.

fields.subtitle: Inspired Fencing
fields.title: Looking for the best fence or gate in town?
fields.description: We love what we do and we do it with passion. We value quality workmanship and customer satisfaction.
